steps.y320vro9: Run passed the @asylum-demon boss or kill him to get the @demons-great-hammer
steps.1sllsqk6: Talk to the Asylum knight to get the @estus-flask and @undead-asylum-f2-east-key
steps.7rsqjhoy: Unlock the gate leading to bonfire
steps.2ycnnuw3: If you choose a magic class then grab your catalyst or @pyromancy-flame
steps.ti5fmznh: Kill the @asylum-demon boss if you haven't already, remembering to do a two-handed drop attack at the start
steps.709dfdr1: Continue on to @firelink-shrine, grabbing the soul on the left on the way up to the nest

steps.u02losyh: Talk to @petrus-of-thorolund to get the @copper-coin and optionally join the @way-of-white covenant
steps.6s1jvfti: Pick up the souls, @humanity, @firebomb[Firebombs], @homeward-bone[Homeward Bones], @morning-star, @talisman, @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs] and @lloyds-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] around the shrine
steps.elsthksz: Run around the graveyard and pick up the souls, @zweihander, @winged-spear, @caduceus-round-shield and the @binoculars
steps.hkivxqdq: Level up with all your soft souls and then head down to @new-londo-ruins to talk to @rickert-of-vinheim and pick up the souls, @estoc and @transient-curse[Transient Curses]
steps.43uw6b2p: Suicide run in to the ruins to get the @fire-keeper-soul
steps.iybou44j: Head to the @valley-of-drakes and suicide run to the @undead-dragon to grab the soul on the right first, then @astoras-straight-sword and the @dragon-crest-shield
steps.idedjctp: If you died return to the dragon and then go down the valley and take the elevator up to the @darkroot-basin bonfire
steps.plo1u7lc: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] to get the @blue-titanite-chunk and the @grass-crest-shield
steps.sdrod5o9: Go up the basin and pick up the @hunter-set, @longbow and arrows, and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.ejn9py5a: Keep going up to @undead-parish, light the bonfire above @blacksmith-andrei[Andre the Blacksmith], and use the elevator shortcut back to the shrine
steps.8ln37zf8: Pick up the @undead-asylum-f2-west-key from the roof and take a quick return flight back to @northern-undead-asylum[Undead Asylum] to get the @rusted-iron-ring
steps.i1i92ook: Continue up to @undead-burg, picking up the souls and @ring-of-sacrifice from the arches under the aqueduct on the way

steps.m86rnpfn: Remember about the Dragon and the archer!
steps.zf8azua0: Optionally kill the @undead-merchant to get the @uchigatana, @residence-key, @orange-guidance-soapstone and @humanity

8iew8t7c.content: Or keep him alive and buy the useful stuff from him

steps.3cs3j20k: @lloyds-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] for Mimics later on @ 500 souls each

steps.1kduomd3: Pick up the souls, @throwing-knife[Throwing Knives], @light-crossbow and bolts, @rubbish, @humanity from around the first part of the burg
steps.krvf52fz: Open the door below the first archer to get the @wooden-shield
steps.trwkbgqr: Remember about the second archer in the tower!
steps.9zt1hvpg: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] and get the @titanite-chunk and @blue-tearstone-ring
steps.a0lusv2w: Quickly kill the @crystal-lizard under the barrels while going up the tower to get the @twinkling-titanite
steps.2nvog4yg: Go through the fog gate and go up the ladder to take out the two archers
steps.lf0fjrfx: Kill the @taurus-demon boss, remembering to do a two-handed drop attack at the start
steps.oxpvnsll: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 5-10 to get summoned
steps.kxkl459o: Pick up the soul behind the crate in the tower

0d51sbys.content: Talk to @solaire-of-astora[Solaire], answering Yes to his questions to get the @white-sign-soapstone. Praise the Sun!

steps.6694aaah: If you won't need to summon him later you can kill him to get his @sunlight-straight-sword, @iron-and-sun-set, @sunlight-shield and @sunlight-talisman

steps.vxg5fhjj: Try not to get burned alive by the @the-bridge-wyvern[Hellkite Wyvern] as you cross to the middle of the bridge and head down the stairs
steps.bkesunlp: Kick the ladder to open the shortcut back to the bonfire
steps.glinskxn: Go below the bridge and use your bow to attack the wyvern's tail to get the @drake-sword
steps.xi4kwu3i: Go back up on the bridge and make a run for the far side when the wyvern lands
steps.91zgydiz: Light the @warrior-of-sunlight bonfire, optionally join the covenant if you have enough faith, and then open the @undead-parish gate
steps.xz206rwn: Pick up the souls and the @claymore on the bridge

steps.a3h7m8xr: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] up in the tower to get the @titanite-chunk
steps.dt03s7qf: Get the @mystery-key that you will soon need to free @knight-lautrec and grab the soul from the beam
steps.1pg56kmy: Get the @basement-key to unlock the Hellkite Bridge door, pull the lever to open the gate and get the @halberd
steps.ckja840x: Rest at the bonfire above @blacksmith-andrei[Andre the Blacksmith]

wct48qhv.content: Learn the Hurrah gesture from Andre and buy useful stuff from him

steps.1oue3sz3: Talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina outside the gate to @sens-fortress
steps.mkcspvp5: Kill the @the-berenike-knights[Berenike Knight] and get the @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul]
steps.5vfv9ckj: Optionally make a return trip to @firelink-shrine and talk to @anastacia-of-astora to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.0pv5ml30: Kill the @the-channeler[Channeler] and all the zombies
steps.4fpi5c7i: Pick up the soul, @humanity and free @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] from his cell

steps.gxdjevfb: You can summon @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] just outside the fog gate
steps.wx8nlwwy: You can also summon @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] from the ledge after the first ladder to the fog gate if you rescued him and went to talk to him at @firelink-shrine
steps.eknn63ra: Cut off the tail of the first gargoyle to get the @gargoyle-tail-axe

ubg7imhp.content: Talk to @oswald-of-carim, learn the Well! What Is It! gesture and buy useful stuff from him

steps.kujymqph: @purging-stone[Purging Stones] @ 3,000 souls each for @depths[The Depths] later on

steps.y4bgza9i: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 15-25 to get summoned
steps.bbpqra3l: Head back to the Hellkite Bridge and unlock the basement door and head down to the @lower-undead-burg

steps.cx4fd153: Use the @residence-key to free @griggs-of-vinheim from the house and pick up the @sorcerer-set and @sorcerers-catalyst
steps.axxz2rk4: Pick up the @twin-humanities, @mail-breaker, @thief-set, @target-shield and soul from around the burg
steps.i4too0ni: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 20-30 to get summoned

koi9nhyw.content: Head down the stairs and up the left tower to the @undead-merchant-female[Female Undead Merchant] and buy useful stuff from her

steps.r2dcg3fj: @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] @ 500 souls each for @blighttown later on
steps.fwq3net6: @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps] @ 1,000 souls each for @blighttown later on
steps.tcatdliq: @transient-curse[Transient Curses] @ 4,000 souls each for @new-londo-ruins later on

steps.kw5l03eg: Head down to the shrine and talk to @griggs-of-vinheim, answering Yes to his question and buy any sorceries you need from him
steps.nng9p5kj: Optionally kill @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] if you want to keep the @anastacia-of-astora[shrine Firekeeper] alive and don't need @favor-set[his armor] but want the @ring-of-favor-and-protection
steps.e37vucsq: Head back up to the aqueduct, go down the tower and across to the other tower that leads to @depths[The Depths]

steps.kbp0g30q: Kill the first @butcher and get the @large-ember from the chest
steps.bff8iii0: Free @laurentius-of-the-great-swamp by rolling in to the barrels and talk to him
steps.m11c9qfe: Remember about the slime above the first soul!
steps.w08jzlb5: Head back up to the butcher area, drop down the hole behind his table, get the @spider-shield, kill the @giant-rat, get the @sewer-chamber-key and soul
steps.vhs9ef3f: On the upper level kill the @the-channeler[Channeler], and pick up the @large-titanite-shard and @greataxe
steps.l0npcyqv: Either slide, drop or walk down to the lower level and beward the @basilisk[Basilisks]!
steps.abkfunuk: On the lower level get the @ring-of-the-evil-eye and @humanity
steps.po16gq8a: Open up the shortcut back to the bonfire and if you're not already in human form go to the bonfire and reverse hollowing
steps.05r27fat: Go back down and get @knight-kirk to invade and then kill him
steps.jsspozr8: Head down to the boss fog gate, picking up the @heavy-crossbow and bolts on the way

steps.jnjyb5lh: You can summon @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] just above the fog gate
steps.wht0o784: You can also summon @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] using the summon sign on the other side of the pillar from Solaire
steps.1nzhhyx5: Cut off the tail of the dragon to get the @dragon-kings-great-axe[Dragon King Great Axe]
steps.b16b4f50: Pick up the @warrior-set when you've killed it

steps.ujf0vjel: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 25-35 to get summoned
steps.tyxb9k1u: Talk to @domhnall-of-zena, learn the Joy gesture and buy any armor, arrows etc. that you need
steps.znxj9jmr: Make sure you have some @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] and @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps], if not run back to the @undead-merchant-female[Female Undead Merchant] and buy some
steps.l32vjfwr: Open the door to @blighttown and head down the ladder

steps.n5x7t6j1: Take it slowly. Be wary of @blowdart-sniper[Blowdart Snipers]!
steps.wurgr41x: Make a running jump to get the @iaito, aim for the post
steps.7xo2rtco: Go down below where the Iaito was to get the @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps] and walk over the swaying bridge to get the @humanity and then go back up to the bonfire
steps.cfxew3b2: Continue on passed the bonfire and remember about the collapsing floor trap beside the soul!
steps.cftgb24y: Move on to the next section remembering about the @blowdart-sniper perched on a high ledge
steps.bm96srkd: Go down the longest ladder in this section and get rid of the @blowdart-sniper and grab the @eagle-shield
steps.rdelgwai: Go back up to snipe the @parasitic-wall-hugger with your bow and go down to get the @power-within pyromancy spell
steps.bl01cos1: Head through the gap in the wall and down the ladder to the fog gate
steps.x70la5mj: Double back and fall down to grab the @whip
steps.l9dk3ekw: Fall down again and continue down the walkways towards the second bonfire, remembering about the @blowdart-sniper along the way
steps.vt7ycykp: Get the @wanderer-set and the @falchion from beside the sniper
steps.fle0ccvw: Put on the @rusted-iron-ring before you get to the bottom and make a run for the bonfire
steps.4iiu19cw: Light the second bonfire and get the @dragon-scale from the chest in the bonfire tunnel
steps.04aht0o6: Run around the swamp to get the @pyromancer-set, @poison-mist pyromancy spell, the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], @server and souls
steps.adgsq3z9: Take a quick detour up the branch towards @the-great-hollow to get the @plank-shield on the corpse and the @twin-humanities behind the illusory wall
steps.xkfy0whj: Kill the boulder throwing @infested-barbarian[Infested Barbarians] to get the @great-club
steps.oqpv6z5w: Optionally farm the @giant-leech[Giant Leeches] for @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards] and @green-titanite-shard[Green Titanite Shards]
steps.rl8hxd5p: Go up on the wheel, go up two ladders and then run around the ledge to kill the @blowdart-sniper[Blowdart Snipers]
steps.6hz86cfa: Slide down the ladder, kill the @flaming-attack-dog[Dogs] and pick up the @fire-keeper-soul
steps.tj7q3o5d: Return to the bonfire and if you're not human then reverse hollowing and kill @maneater-mildred when she invades to get the @butcher-knife and some @humanity

steps.w02dk3ak: You can summon @maneater-mildred from beside the fog gate if you killed her

7nbewmgo.content: Go down and hit the illusory wall and talk to @eingyi, answering Yes to his question so he moves to the side. Reload your game if you answered No and try again

steps.kobw2o2c: If you want to buy the @poison-mist or @toxic-mist pyromancy spells then you need to get infested with an @egg-head first
steps.q4v7k2fd: If your intelligence is 11 or above he will give you a @pyromancy-flame

28yb6ojw.content: Talk to @the-ancient-spider-queen and optionally join the @chaos-servant covenant

steps.nr251ns3: If you joined the convenant then feed her 30 @humanity to open up the shortcut to @lost-izalith

steps.j9zpnxqe: Light this bonfire and then return to the previous bonfire
steps.xgu3ajm3: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 25-40 to get summoned
steps.67tcldft: Talk to @quelana-of-izalith if she is there to upgrade your @pyromancy-flame or buy some Pyromancy spells
steps.dot7ay6l: Go up on the wheel again and at the top of first ladder cross @[That Fucking Branch] to get the @crimson-set, @tin-banishment-catalyst and @remedy sorcery
steps.grw1ydpe: Keep going up to the top and get the @key-to-new-londo-ruins
steps.sunz3qwl: Go out to the @valley-of-drakes and kill the @undead-dragon with your bow or spells
steps.4fl9dse8: If you didn't kill @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] earlier pick up the @dingy-set and @black-eye-orb from where @anastacia-of-astora was sitting

pzh47w68.content: Talk to the various people now at the shrine

steps.rpt10q0w: @griggs-of-vinheim to learn sorceries if your intelligence is 10 or over
steps.1ivrcm37: @laurentius-of-the-great-swamp to get a @pyromancy-flame if you need one and to upgrade it
steps.sq7t1qa9: @petrus-of-thorolund to buy any miracles you need
steps.n3dcyhpo: @kingseeker-frampt if you want to trade some titanite or items

steps.oz9gwvba: Head to the @undead-parish and rest at the bonfire above Andre
steps.puklbf2w: Give the @large-ember to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre the Blacksmith] and upgrade your weapons
steps.btdcjfb3: Head in to @darkroot-garden, rest at the bonfire behind the illusory wall and open the door using the @crest-of-artorias but do not go through it
steps.1cxe7dnk: Head up to the tower and kill @havel-the-rock to get @havels-ring
steps.6ujdswzx: Make sure you are wearing the @rusted-iron-ring
steps.qyfdr81j: Kill the @crystal-golem[Crystal Golems] and then the @hydra to get the @dragon-scale and @dusk-crown-ring
steps.ylrgeen7: Kill the @golden-crystal-golem, reloading your game if it's not there
steps.g3gy58l5: Talk to @dusk-of-oolacile, answering Yes to her question
steps.1sxrlbk3: Go back to where the Hydra fight happened and summon @dusk-of-oolacile, learn her Proper Bow gesture and buy any sorceries you need or the catalyst
steps.knvqj2lh: Go back to where you killed the @golden-crystal-golem and pick up the @antiquated-set
steps.dfphfstm: Climb up the ladder beside the waterfall and then climb the second ladder to the bridge
steps.kh7y2dnu: Head across the bridge in to @darkroot-garden

steps.ay50s7yn: Draw out the @mushroom-people and get the @enchanted-ember from the chest
steps.s8uzsd0i: Head deeper in to the forest to the broken tower beside the bridge and get the @stone-knight-set from the chest behind the tower
steps.9lgeewah: Go across the bridge and talk to @alvina-of-the-darkroot-wood and optionally join the @forest-hunter covenant to get the @cat-covenant-ring
steps.9bkl95hd: If you joined the covenant talk to @shiva-of-the-east so that you can buy stuff from him later

huqz3xso.content: If you didn't join the covenant

steps.ttg4sycb: Clear out the rest of the enemies in this section of the forest

steps.yy1rwmnw: Go to the lower section of the forest and kill all the @ents and pick up the @eastern-set
steps.1rlz7jvh: Return to the bonfire through the door you opened earlier with the @crest-of-artorias
steps.q3vuqgyl: Go through the gap in the wall to the right of the door and head down, remembering that when you pick up the soul on the right it will spawn three @ents
steps.9jdpprj0: After the fog gate hit the tree on the right to open up a passage to a secret area
steps.k128bn0g: Kill the @great-stone-knight in the main area first, then the one in the tower and pick up the @wolf-ring
steps.gtcbmmd7: Head back out of the secret area and kill the other @great-stone-knight[Great Stone Knights] and @ents that spawn
steps.9prni7hj: Pick up the @partizan from the alcove on the left wall

steps.hvpgrwgd: You can summon @witch-beatrice at the bottom of the tower leading to the boss
steps.don7dw8w: After the fight head up the tower to get the @watchtower-basement-key, @divine-ember and @homeward-bone

steps.l34167qm: Go back through the forest and kill @great-grey-wolf-sif to get the @covenant-of-artorias and remember to pick up the @hornet-ring
steps.cf5yubom: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 15-25 for the Butterfly and 20-50 for Sif, though summons for both are rare
steps.r5icrba7: Return to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and give him the @divine-ember and upgrade your weapon if needed
steps.pfvj2h0h: @reah-of-thorolund[Reah] and her companions should be gone. If @petrus-of-thorolund[Petrus] is there talk to him and then kill him now if you don't want him to kill Reah later. If he's not then come back later
steps.zeddo912: Make a quick run down to @new-londo-ruins, give the @enchanted-ember to @blacksmith-rickert-of-vinheim and upgrade your weapons if needed

mukaqixt.content: If you're a member of the @forest-hunter covenant and talked to @shiva-of-the-east[Shiva] earlier then optionally do a quick run to @blighttown to talk to him

steps.3732ujyr: Buy weapons or the @east-wood-grain-ring from him
steps.6eippeuj: If you've bought all you need then you can now kill him and his bodyguard to get their gear but you will be kicked out of the covenant
steps.eamm76s8: If you fail to kill him then they will return to the forest where you first met them and you can kill them there

steps.nlq5n7wq: Head back to the @undead-parish and rest at the bonfire above Andre

steps.c45dtom6: Cross the first swinging blade walkway, remembering about the @serpent-mage trying to knock you off
steps.o4pa8yby: Take out the @serpent-mage with your bow before crossing the second walkway and remember about the arrow trap at the end
steps.rzbexy6g: Get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards] from the chest
steps.o56mzjib: Cross the next walkway and remember about the boulder and the @man-serpent[Serpent Soldier] at the end
steps.is8wmt98: Run halfway to the fog gate, wait for a boulder and then run to the top and get the @ring-of-steel-protection from the chest
steps.9tqsrwr1: Go back to the fog gate and remember about the reverse arrow trap in the next room
steps.us1akhen: Wait for a boulder and then run up and jump off to the left just before the broken pillar on to a wooden platform
steps.wo1q0ol7: Run up to the boulder switch, turn it so that it breaks the wall, then turn it so that it starts filling the hole
steps.0cfdhny1: Pick up the @shotel and talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina
steps.nuyy4lq9: Return to the boulder switch and point it outside
steps.nl6d4bbf: Run down to the hole the boulder fills, get the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring and use a @lloyds-talisman on the mimic chest to get the @lightning-spear
steps.g3khcafv: Use the elevator to get back to the boulder switch room and continue through the corridor, remembering about the multi arrow trap
steps.97kni9xp: Cross the next swinging blade walkway, kill the @man-serpent[Serpent Soldiers] and get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards]
steps.x1cg0xdp: Cross the last swinging blade walkway, remembering about the @serpent-mage at the start and the arrow traps at the end
steps.wf06qv7m: Go through the fog gate and wait for a gap in the fire and light the first bonfire

pmi9g4oi.content: Jump across the gap in the walkway and buy useful stuff from the @crestfallen-merchant

steps.hq6c8ade: Go down the stairs below the merchant and get the @cage-key
steps.8k7d3eox: Get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], @sniper-crossbow,  bolts and @flame-stoneplate-ring from around the fortress
steps.9liid0uu: Kill @ricard-the-archer to get his @ricards-rapier[Rapier] and get the @divine-blessing and @rare-ring-of-sacrifice in the tower above him
steps.qcr7behe: Open the cage shortcut using the @cage-key and quickly run in and out of the cage to send it down

wxzyhkzk.content: Kill the @iron-golem to open up the portal to @anor-londo

steps.sbosdpf3: You can summon @iron-knight-tarkus in the tower across from the fog gate

steps.8ua4vfeq: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 40-50 to get summoned
steps.6lv6sgd3: Put on the @rusted-iron-ring, go down in the cage elevator and drop down on to the ledge with the serpents and kill them
steps.c3v1z6uu: Kill the two @titanite-demon[Titanite Demons] in the first area to get @demon-titanite[Demon Titanites] and the @scythe
steps.gpwqb6ng: Kill the other two @titanite-demon[Titanite Demons] to get more @demon-titanite[Demon Titanites]
steps.mg9qentm: Climb the ladder out of the pit, hit the illusory wall, climb the second ladder and kill the giant that opened the gate to get a @titanite-chunk
steps.78v13jkq: Return to the wooden platform you jump on to during the boulder run and drop down the other side to get the @slumbering-dragoncrest-ring
steps.t5voz8vb: Return to the bonfire and go up and use the portal to @anor-londo

steps.apxgtxp9: Run passed the @sentinel[Sentinels], light the bonfire, talk to @darkmoon-knightess and reinforce your @estus-flask if you need to
steps.8ptlhwzz: Kill the two @sentinel[Sentinels] you ran passed and open the chest to get a @demon-titanite
steps.ji31k207: Cross the courtyard and kill the other two, using a @lloyds-talisman on the right mimic chest to get the @halberd[Crystal Halberd] and opening the left chest to get a @twinkling-titanite
steps.ef6gk8ro: Go down the elevator and kill the @gargoyle-lightning[Lightning Gargoyle]
steps.v7py0m2j: Get the @demon-titanite from the chest below and walk up the beams in to the chapel
steps.sw3oz9j7: Walk along the rafters and remember to hit the chain of the chandelier
steps.g6eqe30i: Jump down onto the platform with the statues and roll through the pillars on the other side of the room. Kill the @painting-guardian and open the chest to get the @divine-blessing.
steps.zzcn0jy9: Turn the bridge lever once in an anti-clockwise direction to lower the platform and kill the second @gargoyle-lightning[Lightning Gargoyle]
steps.8e0jga87: Go up the giant staircase and kill the @sentinel[Sentinels] and @bat-wing-demon[Bat Wing Demons]
steps.quiy8mhf: Go up the buttress and kill the right @silver-knight[Silver Knight Archer], remembering not to use your shield but dodge towards him instead until he starts meleeing
steps.699o3bk1: If you have the balls go and kill the second archer to get the @soul-of-a-hero
steps.gh9akosj: Drop down on to the platform after the first archer and enter the left door to light the bonfire. Congratulate yourself!
steps.7hauubjm: Cross the hallway and get the @sunlight-medal[Sunlight Medals] from the chest
steps.s6r1jkg7: Go down the corridor and through the left door and hit the illusory wall
steps.38c9a8wb: Go down in to the basement and open the four chests that sit together to get @havels-set, @havels-greatshield and the @dragon-tooth
steps.b91f6w66: Use a @lloyds-talisman on the single mimic chest to get the @club[Occult Club]
steps.j4qva0gf: Go up the stairs and use @lloyds-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] on the two mimic chests to get the @silver-coin[Silver Coins] and the @gold-coin
steps.8xso719w: Use ranged attacks to kill the @titanite-demon from above
steps.ws1k70f9: Kill the @silver-knight[Silver Knight Archer] at the end of the corridor
steps.v9svkdp5: Coming from the dead archer go through the right door and up to the roof, remembering about the @silver-knight behind the door
steps.9urp3u6d: Kill the archer on the right but then head down the stairs on the left to talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer]
steps.17bnqidj: Bait each of the four @silver-knight[Silver Knights] one at a time from the room up on to the roof to kill them
steps.9esn4w9s: Talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] again to get the @tiny-beings-ring
steps.zrabhv44: Open the chest in the room to get the two @demon-titanite[Demon Titanites]
steps.hwomku3c: Unlock the door, go back up the roof and go down the stairs where the archer was
steps.wxsaz1tm: Go across the corridor and kill the two @silver-knight[Silver Knights], get the @silver-knight-set from the two chests and unlock the shortcut back to the bonfire
steps.5jvfucbn: Go back upstairs and keep going up to top of the large hall, go around the walkway and down to the @giant-blacksmith
steps.v80lt45g: Get the @hawk-ring from the chest behind him

7ai39xv3.content: Talk to him and buy useful stuff from him

steps.kf4el4kw: Create any lightning weapons you need

steps.68o0cklj: Open the gate leading back to the giant staircase and pick up the @titanite-chunk
steps.gcx43e30: Go back upstairs and drop out the broken window to get the @dragonslayer-greatbow
steps.0fgbfxe4: Go back to the large hall and open the large main door
steps.gtvvqyex: Return to the bonfire if you need to

steps.ubhmptu5: You can summon @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] from the steps near the archer in the large hall
steps.rdzvklu2: The best place to summon other players for this fight is the second bonfire in the room after the archers
steps.hrd4qtxj: If you want to get @smoughs-set from @domnhall-of-zena[Domhnhall of Zena] or want to make @smoughs-hammer then kill Ornstein first
steps.4uusyz3r: If you want to get @ornsteins-set from @domnhall-of-zena[Domhnhall of Zena] or want the @leo-ring or want to make the @dragon-slayer-spear then kill Smough first

steps.vktb8st4: Go up one the screw elevators and light the bonfire
steps.82o8ukgb: Talk to @gwynevere[Princess Gwynevere], get the @lordvessel and optionally join the @princess-guard covenant
steps.n8r49bg2: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 40-50 to get summoned

3io79qhu.content: If you didn't kill @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] earlier then return to the large hall and use the the @black-eye-orb to invade his world and kill him

steps.jhykc260: You will get the @anastacia-of-astora[Ring of Favor and Protection], @anastacia-of-astora's soul, a @souvenir-of-reprisal and five @humanity
steps.g6igavkm: When you return to @firelink-shrine you can revive @anastacia-of-astora with her soul or you can choose to use it to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.bzt6l46w: After killing him you can get the @favor-set from the balcony above where you fought @ornstein-and-smough

steps.e1113j2g: Now that we can fast travel, warp back to @firelink-shrine

6naxciu3.content: Talk to the various people now at the shrine

steps.yf3krkqp: Talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] and answer Yes to his question to get the @emit-force miracle
steps.kbq4o81z: Do not speak to @kingseeker-frampt[Frampt] if you want to join the @darkwraith covenant later
steps.yybi3ss1: Talk to @domhnall-of-zena under the aqueduct to buy any of the boss armor you need

steps.hvi3x7c3: Take a flight back to @northern-undead-asylum[Undead Asylum]

steps.wcndk3mc: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] near your starting cell to get a @red-titanite-chunk and pick up the @peculiar-doll
steps.qxw207c1: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] near where you picked up your first weapon to get another @red-titanite-chunk
steps.vi7rc178: Kill the now hollow Elite Knight to get the @crest-shield

steps.xdgvu8tr: Run up to the @undead-merchant-female[Female Undead Merchant] in the aqueduct and buy all the @transient-curse[Transient Curses] she has and equip them
steps.ai004rd5: On your way to the wooden bridges get ready to be attacked by the @crestfallen-warrior
steps.eothdl4i: Use one of your @transient-curse[Transient Curses] and keep them visible on your HUD so that you know when it expires
steps.2hew0qgw: Make your way through the first part of the ruins picking up the @parrying-dagger and killing the @banshee to get the two @transient-curse[Transient Curses]
steps.60a9reug: Kick the ladder to relase it and go down and kill the two @ghost[Ghosts] to stop them attacking you from below
steps.alqfpmoz: Approach the house and kill the @ghost[Ghosts] that come out of the water before entering house
steps.tbnd6ujt: Go up the ladder in the fireplace and talk to  @ingward to get the @key-to-the-seal and buy more @transient-curse[Transient Curses] if you need them
steps.becpaopn: Go downstairs and get the @cursebite-ring from the ledge
steps.19lml41y: Go out the other door and get @green-titanite-shard, @humanity and jump to the roof to get the @rare-ring-of-sacrifice
steps.x7wpabhl: Head to the tower, open the door with the @key-to-the-seal and push the lever clockwise to drain the water
steps.a1fonuxl: Go upstairs in the tower and get the @composite-bow and large arrows
steps.rq8nbegv: Pull the lever and go down the elevator to the @valley-of-drakes entrance
steps.6doqbcoy: Kill the @drake[Drakes], get the @brigand-armor-set and @spider-shield, and go up the ladder to get the @red-tearstone-ring
steps.kzp874ta: Continue through the buildings and through the fog gate
steps.60ojia9h: Clear out the @darkwraith-knight[Darkwraith Knights] and @mass-of-souls so you can get the @humanity and trigger the elevator shortcut to the beginning of the ruins
steps.l9546owt: Go out the smaller side door and up to open the chest with the @very-large-ember[Very Large Ember]
steps.1as6w1k8: Go back down and out the larger door and pick up the souls and six @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs]
steps.nreyeyow: Hit the illusory wall and open the chest to get a @titanite-chunk
steps.77ql06n5: Clear out the @darkwraith-knight[Darkwraith Knights] and @mass-of-souls and get the @titanite-chunk from the chest

steps.c6h6lxnf: You can summon @witch-beatrice from behind the pillar if you previously summoned her for the @moonlight-butterfly fight

steps.ui698l34: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60-75 to get summoned
steps.xw1pwi13: Warp to @undead-parish and give the @very-large-ember to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and upgrade your weapons
steps.zjwirslk: Warp to @firelink-shrine and go down to the @valley-of-drakes to get the @witch-set and @beatrices-catalyst
steps.tl5jaw93: Make sure you have at least three @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] and warp to the @daughter-of-chaos bonfire
steps.err8x271: Go talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] in the @blighttown swamp and give him the @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] to get the @pierce-shield
steps.dmjy58si: Go up the branch and hit the illusory wall behind the chest and go in to @the-great-hollow

steps.ycbxy4fc: Note: It's very hard to give good directions for this section due to the maze of branches and random spawning patterns of the Crystal Lizards
steps.7wpxpt3a: Light and rest at the bonfire after you go down the first ladder
steps.w7lf03f6: Make your way down the branches looking out for @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] and @basilisk[Basilisks]
steps.l4eeiwpv: Near the top you can roll down in to the main tree trunk in the center of the area to pick up the @cloranthy-ring
steps.2xu8vmfk: Roll and drop to various branches to get the titanites
steps.lpabnjlu: After you kill the first three @basilisk[Basilisks] there is a soul hidden to the left as you exit the cave they were in
steps.sic7wmr5: Slide down the two ladders to the first canopy and kill the two @basilisk[Basilisks] there
steps.6el3za3l: Slide down the ladder in the center to the next canopy and be ready to kill four more and then pick up the soul
steps.h34285oj: Continue down the branches and then on to the mushrooms, exiting the fog gate at the bottom to get to @ash-lake

steps.2a4l2etb: Light and rest at the bonfire
steps.tuv9ur8p: Kill the @black-hydra to get two @dragon-scale[Dragon Scales] and then get one more from the corpse to the left
steps.fzbqbmuk: Walk along the sand and get the @dragon-scale from the small dead tree
steps.vz4uptvx: Get the @dragon-scale from the corpse on left by the water after the small dead tree
steps.42fvsgd1: Go up the branch on the outside of the first huge tree, drop off to the right on to the hidden platform and head in to the tree to get the @great-magic-barrier miracle
steps.vjkep30z: Continue along the sand to the next tree, light the bonfire and optionally join the @path-of-the-dragon covenant
steps.4owi48ip: Cut off the tail of the dragon to get the @dragon-greatsword
steps.qtzck8w9: Make sure you have some @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps] in case you get toxic from the @engorged-zombie[Engorged Zombies]

steps.wj52cq52: Go down the elevator and turn the platform lever anti-clockwise and enter the chapel
steps.tzf9qarx: Examine the painting to warp to the @painted-world-of-ariamis
steps.wkfqx9nr: Light and rest at the bonfire
steps.rxwudqn9: Remember to use range attacks on the @engorged-zombie[Engorged Zombies] so you don't get toxic
steps.x7dgivcv: Go up the stairs and on to the roof of the first building and use your bow to pull the two @crow-demon[Crow Demons] from the other tower to you so they don't ambush you later
steps.fjhwh7sv: Drop down to get the @dried-finger and then go the bottom floor of the building to get the soul
steps.2hf1kpe9: Clear out the next building, remembering about the two @zombie[Zombies] hanging from the ledge, and hit the rope holding the zombie to drop it down
steps.0itj0i2d: Go upstairs, jump across the gap and get the soul and the @egg-vermifuge, slide down the ladder and get the @painting-guardian-set
steps.lflt7kob: Lure the @crow-demon[Crow Demons] out of the tower one by one
steps.htln11jt: Go to the top of the spiral staircase to get the @red-sign-soapstone and on the way back down drop to the ledge to get the soul
steps.ea25kvyi: Kill the @undead-dragon and then pick up the soul, @dragon-scale and the @bloodshield from the bridge
steps.3dp9c357: Go back to the tower, through the fog gate and open the shortcut back to the bonfire
steps.rdkbv8yr: Go down to the basement and kill the six @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons], making sure to pull one at a time with your bow
steps.3eu1e0i9: Grab the two souls and turn the lever to open the gate that leads to the boss
steps.9aezp73z: Hit the illusory wall and explore the tunnels, kill the three @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons], get the @annex-key and kill the @engorged-zombie to get the @fire-surge pyromancy
steps.rd035o9o: Leave the tunnels using the well ladder, go up the stairs to get the @ring-of-sacrifice and grab the @humanity from the zombie you dropped earlier
steps.yn6xri7f: Open the Annex door and head up the stairs
steps.mlbgb7ec: Head up on to the roof of the building to the left, kill the two @crow-demon[Crow Demons], watch for an ambush by two more and get the @vow-of-silence miracle
steps.5qabyfst: Take the stairs in to the round tower and pick up the @black-set
steps.kuusi4wo: Go to the lower section and get the @dark-ember
steps.ffd03us0: Break the wooden fence to get @velkas-rapier, drop down in to the building and get the @gold-coin
steps.c9ne5wyt: Return to the bonfire and reverse hollowing
steps.9x8oo70s: Go the open area with all the spikes, wait for @king-jeremiah to invade and kill him to get the @notched-whip
steps.5nm6yp7r: Pick up the souls in the area and the @acid-surge pyromancy hidden behind the wall
steps.yxb53njk: Go through the gate you opened earlier, walk across the bridge, watching out for the zombies and kill the @the-tower-knight[Tower Knight] to get the @large-titanite-shard
steps.8j9z1nxx: Reload your game before you enter the fog gate, go through and pick up the @xanthous-set that should now have appeared

steps.6asv6h9i: Cut off her tail to get @priscillas-dagger

steps.b6piv20v: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 55-60 to get summoned
steps.oxqe7b0r: Jump off the ledge to warp back to @anor-londo
steps.zzax6lur: Leave the chapel and turn the platform lever clockwise to return it to its normal position and go to the first @anor-londo bonfire
steps.x3qit2cm: Warp to @undead-parish and give the @dark-ember to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and upgrade your weapons
steps.hlx58pcd: Warp back to @anor-londo and head to @the-dukes-archives

steps.k7hi15ko: Kill the two @mecha-boar[Mecha Boars] and rest at the bonfire
steps.4m0svo10: Go up the first elevator and kill the @crystal-golem to get the @broken-pendant (DLC Only)
steps.l8u2mrcv: Clear out the crystal skeletons and the @the-channeler[Channeler] and get the soul
steps.vd6wo4tk: Take the left hand side stairs and get the @twinkling-titanite from the chest
steps.w7n8emz1: Go around to the other side and get the @twinkling-titanite from the balcony and the crystal @knight-shield from the mimic
steps.sbogct13: Take the elevator up to the next level, draw out and kill the crytalline hollow, and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard on the stairs to get two @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanites]
steps.t6ua4k02: Put on a @rare-ring-of-sacrifice, go through the fog gate and let @seath-the-scaleless kill you
steps.5vxy8xa9: Rest at the cell bonfire and kill the @man-serpent to get the @archive-tower-cell-key
steps.3p6xa3w9: Let yourself out of the cell, try to kill the two @man-serpent[Man Serpents] that run passed then kill the four @pisaca[Pisacas] that are chasing them
steps.i3jlc6tb: Head up the stairs and up the ladder, walk along the ledge to the left and drop down to the cell to get the @maiden-set and the @white-seance-ring
steps.ldcrktqm: Open the third cell, drop down to get the @archive-prison-extra-key and use it to open the second cell and get the soul
steps.gvdsyb35: Kill the rest of the @pisaca[Pisacas] at the bottom, get the @soothing-sunlight and @bountiful-sunlight miracles, and talk to @big-hat-logan
steps.bpmwxe20: Go up the ladder, kill the two @man-serpent[Man Serpents], turn off the alarm and get the @archive-tower-giant-door-key from the chest
steps.kv1bbpz8: Head back up to your cell and open the other door, drop down to get the soul and then drop down a couple of levels back to the alarm
steps.cwm4usyk: Head all the way back up and open the door at the top of the ladder
steps.9uqpzekh: Head up and kill the @the-channeler[Channeler] up on the ledge and the second one around the corner
steps.9njxt6nh: Head to the left, spin the staircase around, go down to get the @twinkling-titanite from the chest and then head back up the stairs again
steps.lmhy1pk1: Make sure you have full health and drop down to the second spinning staircase
steps.5epbz8ks: Go up the stairs and get the @strong-magic-shield sorcery
steps.0bxdxmag: Spin the stairs, go down and kill the archer on the ledge, slide down the ladder and pull the lever to open the bookcase shortcut
steps.kubxfcpf: Go in to the larger of the two rooms and get the @symbol-of-avarice and the enchanted @falchion from the mimic in the far right part of the room
steps.ietilatt: Open the other chests, remembering about the one behind the bookcase, to get the @channeler-set, @archive-tower-giant-cell-key and the @crystal-ember
steps.jzuvyirb: Go to the smaller room and get the @blue-titanite-chunk from the chest
steps.d16rjju8: Go out through the bookcase shortcut and rest at the bonfire
steps.lbogoxw3: Clear out the two rooms of the library, including the archer on the bookcase and the @the-channeler[Channelers]
steps.zj3upch0: Spin the staircase and jump off the lower steps while it's rotating to land on the top of the bookshelf and get the @avelyn crossbow from the chest
steps.sd482prb: Go back through the bookcase shortcut, pull the lever in the larger room to lower the stairs, get the @prism-stone[Prism Stones] from the chest and go through the fog gate
steps.catof759: Kill the @golden-crystal-golem and talk to @sieglinde-of-catarina, answering Yes to her question
steps.uu6jvnfv: Kill the other @crystal-golem[Crystal Golems] and pick up the @crystalline-set and the @blue-titanite-chunk

steps.tg9gpwg6: Take the first invisible path and get the @humanity
steps.tmdodhx2: Take the next invisible path, kill the @crystal-golem, drop off to the left and double back in to the small tunnel behind you and kill the three @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards]
steps.o394f7ef: Turn around again and take the invisible path down to get the @blue-titanite-slab
steps.7i5btcwf: Head back up and kill the @golden-crystal-golem and get the @blue-titanite-chunk
steps.os497zt8: Go down the last invisible path and get the soul in front of the @moonlight-butterfly but be careful because it will probably attack you
steps.o90jj1s5: Put on the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring and kill the @man-eater-shell[Man-Eater Shells] to get some @purging-stone[Purging Stones] and @twinkling-titanite

steps.ddav715w: You have to break the crystal before you can do damage to him
steps.b4jg0enq: Cut off his tail to get the @moonlight-greatsword

steps.kbqgh45f: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60-75+ to get summoned

ill6lzoh.content: Return to the bonfire, go through the bookcase shortcut and in to the small room to talk to @big-hat-logan and buy any sorceries you need

steps.0a7pcahw: If you want @big-hats-set then you will need to buy all of his sorceries to get him to leave and go hollow
steps.wi7dpnhj: If you only need the @white-dragon-breath sorcery, his @big-hats-set[Big Hat] and @tin-crystallization-catalyst you can kill him now
steps.wjul17rp: When he has left, go to the room where you first encountered @seath-the-scaleless, kill him and then return to this room to get @big-hats-set from the new chest

steps.8dp0h7oz: Go back up the ladder, spin the stairs, go down them and out on to the balcony, and go back in to the prison area
steps.0n8e01j6: Go down to the bottom and use the @archive-tower-giant-cell-key to open the gate and get the @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul]
steps.3gt8kto3: Return to the archives, go down one floor to the second floor, go to the first archive room and use the lever to call the elevator
steps.ssh1zll7: Go to the room where you first encountered @seath-the-scaleless and get the @large-magic-ember from the chest and the soul from the balcony
steps.30em7qcy: Return to the bonfire, warp to @firelink-shrine, talk to @sieglinde-of-catarina[Sieglinde], answering Yes to her question, and go down to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.54vo8nyq: Go down to @new-londo-ruins, give the @large-magic-ember to @blacksmith-rickert-of-vinheim[Rickert] and upgrade your weapons if needed
steps.bocefq6o: Warp to the Chamber of the Princess bonfire, give the @crystal-ember to the @giant-blacksmith and upgrade your weapons if needed
steps.zwiy0wao: Warp to the @daughter-of-chaos bonfire, go down to the @demon-ruins, rest at the first bonfire

steps.balax69m: Get the @gold-hemmed-black-set to start the fight

steps.40zkih1n: Make sure you are human and continue down in to the ruins
steps.3zxlin8i: Wait for @knight-kirk to invade and then kill him to get the @spiked-shield and @barbed-straight-sword
steps.4gm8cx3f: Roll down to the first platform, kill the @burrowing-rockworm guarding the bonfire and rest there
steps.p09lnqqy: Go down the stairs and go left along the ledge to get the @large-flame-ember from the chest, remembering about the @burrowing-rockworm traps

j7g7jxe1.content: Go back to the fog gate and if you are level two in the @chaos-servant covenant then go down to the right and open the shortcut to @lost-izalith

steps.1d497zf4: If you want to save @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] then kill all the bugs to get the @sunlight-maggot and use this shortcut to talk to him

i8ues9ke.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @demon-firesage

steps.6u5shq9m: Don't forget the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior up the stairs behind the @stone-demon[Stone Demons]

steps.brzer651: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 55-60+ to get summoned
steps.vhps5zb4: Go upstairs to open the shortcut back to @quelaags-domain
steps.bycn4xw2: Go back the way you came and go down and rest at the bonfire

steps.83yld9j6: Cut off his tail and then kill the tail to get @orange-charred-ring, though he will drop the ring anyway when killed
steps.uq0gh8ya: Don't forget the @green-titanite-shard in the open area around to the right

steps.46gxhuyv: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60+ to get summoned
steps.8s8p94xc: Leave boss area by the tunnel, rest at the bonfire and talk to @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] if he's there

steps.mfnn6pax: Make your way to the first building, picking up the two souls along the way, and open the chest inside to get another soul
steps.fmlk1b3e: Run up the branch of the next building and get the @twin-humanities
steps.plcstbtc: Drop down to the base of the building and hit the illusory wall of the building, rest at the bonfire and make sure you are human
steps.ca34ityi: Continue on in to the ruins and grab the soul hidden to the left just before you go up the stairs
steps.fzlbgkys: Go up the stairs, kill the @chaos-eater, kill the Daughter of Chaos to get the @izalith-catalyst, and wait for @knight-kirk to invade and then kill him
steps.sljxtmk8: Kill the second @chaos-eater and open the chest to get the @chaos-fire-whip pyromancy
steps.iuloui7l: Go down the branch and kill all the @stone-demon[Stone Demons]
steps.vll6vfow: Kill the @titanite-demon to get a @demon-titanite and if you didn't open the shortcut earlier then open it now and kill the bugs to get the @sunlight-maggot
steps.ydfc017f: Trigger the collapsing floor by walking to the left of the alcove
steps.wtah16t0: Put on the @rusted-iron-ring, walk down the branch, do not talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] yet but instead kill all but one of the @chaos-eater[Chaos Eaters] using ranged attacks
steps.z5vyhjy7: Now talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] and follow him when he jumps in to the pit and make sure he doesn't lose more than half his health while killing the remaining @chaos-eater[Chaos Eaters]
steps.19q5926m: Grab the soul and @green-titanite-shard[Green Titanite Shards] and then talk to him again
steps.6x9pgiir: Make your way through the tunnels, getting the @red-titanite-slab from the chest and then the @red-titanite-chunk after going up the stairs
steps.wg1aizuz: Make your way back up the branches and back up to the boss fog gate

steps.1uh0uzoo: You need to destroy the right orb first, then the left orb and then drop down in the center to kill her

steps.xxkd7dtq: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60-75+ to get summoned
steps.wecbrxyb: Warp back to the @daughter-of-chaos bonfire and get the @thorns-set
steps.p0dovg2h: Go back down to the @demon-ruins, kill the @taurus-demon[Taurus Demons], and get the @chaos-flame-ember and soul from the lava
steps.a7nvoq2y: Warp to the Stone Dragon bonfire, walk along the sand to the @ash-lake bonfire and talk to @sieglinde-of-catarina[Sieglinde] to get a @titanite-slab
steps.b0dpxn61: Make sure you are using a @divine-ember[Divine weapon], warp back to @firelink-shrine and continue down in to @the-catacombs

steps.tiku91iq: Go down to the first bonfire, kill the @undead-mage and pull the first switch
steps.4d5mdvse: Use a ranged attack to take out the next @undead-mage
steps.8saukdw9: Clear out the room the @undead-mage was in and get the @lucerne from the side room
steps.8pn5cnt5: Continue clearing out this area, grabbing the soul from near the archer, head outside passed the statue spike traps, push the second switch and get the soul
steps.yiozhvuj: Cross the bridge and quickly kill the next @undead-mage
steps.y60lupup: Go in to the side room to the right, fall through the floor and try to get the two @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] while avoiding the statue spike traps
steps.h8qemmqp: Climb up the ladder and fall through the floor again to get back to the second switch
steps.vlvunnor: Go back across the bridge and at the end of it drop down three times to the left, pick up the @great-scythe and push the third switch
steps.tax4g37n: Head outside, push the fourth switch, roll through the illusory wall and rest at the bonfire
steps.815omlot: Go across the bridge and through the fog gate, hit the broken wall, drop down and clear out the room
steps.47xd6otl: Continue up the steps, watch out for the giant skeleton that drops from the roof and get the @darkmoon-seance-ring from the coffin
steps.18e59a5l: Go out the broken wall, continue up the steps, kill the @undead-mage and climb up the ladder
steps.rj1u10jo: Get the @tranquil-walk-of-peace miracle and fall through the floor to near the start of the level
steps.bcgurccj: Continue all the way back across the bridges to the building with all of the coffins
steps.6czq0kuf: Nestle in the coffin on the left just before the @titanite-demon to go to the @tomb-of-giants[Tomb of the Giants] and optionally join the @gravelord-servant covenant
steps.qmchybo8: Use the coffin to get back, go down the corridor and through the broken wall, drop down through the floor and kill the @black-knight to get the @white-titanite-chunk
steps.6u6du31e: Use ranged attacks to kill all the @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons] and before dropping down
steps.yic3h84z: Go through the tunnel near where you dropped down and kill the @undead-mage to get the @skull-lantern
steps.5487kpuh: Climb up the two ladders and back to entrance of the building with all the coffins, go outside and drop off to the ledge where you can summon @paladin-leeroy
steps.ywdpxbz9: Drop off to the next ledge to get the @cleric-set and @mace

steps.yiy7f9zc: As described above you can summon @paladin-leeroy from the ledge above the area with the @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons]
steps.lv2ri07s: You will get the @rite-of-kindling when you kill him
steps.snl4crxq: He will drop one of @mask-of-the-father, @mask-of-the-mother or @mask-of-the-child

steps.tcf9j6t6: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 20-40 or 55-65 to get summoned
steps.e5vywd97: Go up the ladder and continue on the @tomb-of-giants[Tomb of the Giants]

steps.yv7j056g: If you got the @sunlight-maggot then wear it otherwise put the @skull-lantern in your left hand
steps.uh7qu1m9: Slide down the coffins, climb down the ladder and rest at the bonfire
steps.eg8fv7iv: Go back up the ladder, along the ledge to the right, drop down the hole, kill all the giant skeletons and get the @large-divine-ember
steps.4pzh5936: Climb back out, hit the illusory wall along the ledge, climb down the ladder, kill the bone towers and @reah-of-thorolund[Reah's] bodyguards but do not talk to her
steps.0qjeoh6x: Get the @white-titanite-chunk, @skull-lantern, souls and head back up the ladder
steps.g8oc9cln: Talk to @patches-the-hyena, answering No to his question and let him kick you down in to the pit
steps.twtqe3m0: Talk to @reah-of-thorolund[Reah] to get the @replenishment miracle
steps.mmpkfzlv: Go back up and talk to @patches-the-hyena[Patches] again, answering No to his question to get @twin-humanities
steps.nb0eriu7: Continue passed him and through the fog gate and kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] that comes running at you
steps.kk9wtgw1: Kill the archer, grab the soul, jump down, get ready for an ambush by bone towers and grab the @covetous-silver-serpent-ring
steps.dlxjpn16: Jump across and kill the giant skeleton and then continue up, hugging the left wall to get the @effigy-shield
steps.es1c2vsq: Go back down to where you killed the last giant skeleton and hug the left wall around to the next bonfire and reverse hollowing
steps.x3y7mh5l: Go down the path, grab the @white-titanite-chunk, go down the ladder, wait for @paladin-leeroy to invade and kill him to get @sanctus and @grant
steps.bwg44zhg: Quickly kill the @crystal-lizard in the tunnel
steps.0xh3bcfa: Continue through the tunnel and down the ledge, clear out the Pinwheels and grab the soul and @white-titanite-slab

steps.k4a9qsfy: After the fight pick up the @paladin-set, though you may need to reload your game to get it to appear

steps.pmh3g6bo: Rest at the bonfire, warp to @firelink-shrine

steps.lumenypv: Drop down the hole, offer the Lord Souls, warp back to the shrine and talk to @anastacia-of-astora to fully kindle the shrine bonfire

5k6dl00l.content: Talk to @patches-the-hyena[Patches], learn his Prostration gesture and buy anything you need from him

steps.syly3yx3: You can also buy other various items and weapons

y0a2hdjs.content: Take a flight back to @northern-undead-asylum[Undead Asylum] and trade items with @snuggly

steps.8495eh1m: You can also get various other titanites and miscellaneous items

steps.l5r4plna: Go to @undead-parish and talk to @reah-of-thorolund[Reah], learn her Prayer gesture and buy any miracles you need
steps.kurqutlx: Go to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and give him the @large-divine-ember and upgrade your weapon if needed
steps.ywxo9sm8: Go back in to the @the-catacombs, drop off the first bridge on to the second, drop down the ledges, go down the spiral staircase and drop down to @blacksmith-vamos
steps.h6x04hes: Give him the @large-flame-ember and @chaos-flame-ember and upgrade your weapon if needed
steps.ux5exzyw: Return to a bonfire and warp to @anor-londo
steps.r8uu0k2e: Put on the @darkmoon-seance-ring, go down the elevator and turn the platform lever anti-clockwise and rest at the bonfire
steps.omdvq5s3: Pick up the @ring-of-the-suns-firstborn and optonally join the @blade-of-the-dark-moon covenant

etlrdtbz.content: If you don't want to join the covenant then go through the fog gate and kill @dark-sun-gwyndolin

steps.ttwsyxgd: Get the @sunlight-blade miracle and @brass-set from the chests after killing her
steps.q866yga9: You can now buy the @gwyndolin-moonlight-set from @domhnall-of-zena
steps.7a7b71i6: @darkmoon-knightess will now attack you if you return to the first @anor-londo bonfire and will drop a @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul]

steps.ecvedf84: Remember to go back return the platform to the up position before leaving here
steps.2qd1o6qi: Optionally go and attack @gwynevere to turn @anor-londo dark and get invaded by members of the @blade-of-the-dark-moon covenant
steps.mexp8r51: If you don't have the DLC go down to #new-game-plus

steps.kzofly96: Go down to @darkroot-basin and examine the portal found near where you fought the @golden-crystal-golem

cciryqrh.content: Rest at the bonfire and continue through the fog gate and kill the @sanctuary-guardian

steps.7g1wu552: Cut off the tail to get the @guardian-tail

steps.cdf95v1w: Continue up the path to @oolacile-sanctuary, rest at the bonfire and talk to @elizabeth, answering Yes to her question
steps.g43o02sd: Get the @humanity from the corpse, head down to @royal-woods and clear out the Ents and the Stone Guardians from the first section
steps.qg4ie3xq: Get the @guardian-set[Guardian Gauntlets] from the tower on the right side, the @blue-titanite-slab from the chest in the center and the @guardian-set[Guardian Leggings] from the left side
steps.i5n5jnd4: Cross the bridge on the left, try not to get squashed by @black-dragon-kalameet[Kalameet], quickly kill the @crystal-lizard and watch out for the Stone Guardian that appears
steps.hgcitabm: Jump down and across the gap on the left and kill the Ents and the Stone Guardian
steps.pep0brbj: Get the @guardian-set[Guardian Helm] from the ledge, and the @guardian-set[Guardian Armor] and @goughs-great-arrow[Gough's Great Arrows] from near where the Stone Guardian was
steps.uearwjdi: Get the @elizabeths-mushroom from the hidden alcove
steps.py0ai5n3: Jump back across the gap and clear out the Ents on the left and get the @gold-coin
steps.19gu0juq: Kill the two Stone Giants near the tower and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.fs2ao6o1: Get the soul from behind the tower, go down on the elevator and then at the bottom grab the soul from around the corner
steps.3dkenvi7: Go across the bridge and talk to @marvelous-chester, answering Yes to his question, and buy anything you need from him and use the elevator to open up the shortcut
steps.d325jadt: Go through the fog gate and kill @artorias-the-abysswalker
steps.1w9ckqtk: Reload your game and kill @lords-blade-ciaran who should now have appeared to get the @lords-blade-set, the @dark-silver-tracer and the @gold-tracer
steps.utlerd4s: Leave by the other door and in to @oolacile-township and rest at the bonfire
steps.j9hevipf: Go back in to @royal-woods and head down the path beside the elevator in to the valley and at the botton get the soul on the left
steps.1jq6qzhf: Continue along the valley, down the ladder, quickly kill the @crystal-lizard, piss off @black-dragon-kalameet enough that he attacks you once and return to the bonfire

steps.oii27mrm: Make sure you have either a @skull-lantern, @sunlight-maggot or the @cast-light sorcery
steps.t9u3keqa: Continue down the steps and stick to the right, grabbing the souls along the way, go around the back of the building and roll down to the next ledge
steps.9kvk398s: Use your light source on the illusory wall on the building to the left and get the @silver-pendant from the chest
steps.g4lbaw45: Kill everything in the other building and get the @dark-orb sorcery from the chest and the @carvings[I'm Sorry carving] from the Bloathead Mage on the outside ledge
steps.mgzi4bv6: Go back to the main path, cross the wooden bridge, get invaded by @marvelous-chester
steps.r4vvyv4x: Continue crossing the wooden bridge, and get the @carvings[Very Good! carving] from the mimic and take out the Bloathead Mage down below with ranged attacks
steps.2q7gd6mp: Go halfway down the stairs, walk across to the rooftop, and kill the @crystal-lizard. You may have to reload the game to make the Crystal Lizard appear.
steps.k0vcbqm6: Continue down and across the walkway, very carefully clear out the ground floor of the building and get the @rubbish, @dark-fog sorcery and soul
steps.fzreoig7: Go upstairs, use your light source on the illusory wall and get the @red-titanite-chunk from the chest
steps.yz29on3u: Head back across the rafters, roll down to the balcony and get the @crest-key from the mimic
steps.9yitzx1p: Drop on to the roof from the next room and go up and across the roof to get a @twin-humanities
steps.4k8dqs5b: Drop off the roof, go across to open up the elevator shortcut and rest at the bonfire
steps.ryp8e0ju: Go back towards the colosseum, go up the stairs to the right and unlock the door using the @crest-key
steps.j9soemb6: Talk to @hawkeye-gough twice, answering Yes to both his questions, so that he grounds @black-dragon-kalameet[Kalameet], and buy the @carvings[Hello and Thank You carvings]

pxkzfnlr.content: Go back in to @royal-woods and down to the valley and kill @black-dragon-kalameet[Kalameet]

steps.6acmh2hs: Cut off his tail to get the @obsidian-greatsword
steps.7bkdjdrf: When you kill him he will drop the @calamity-ring
steps.30rz85qj: When he's dead pick up the souls, the @titanite-slab from the chest underneath the waterfall and the @goughs-great-arrow[Gough's Great Arrows] from the end of the valley

steps.jbgppt4y: Return to the colosseum and go back up to talk to @hawkeye-gough to get @goughs-greatbow
steps.q6bdqfkg: Go back down the elevator shortcut, carefully clear out the Bloatheads and then kill the Chained Prisoner to get the Helm and Leggings from the @chain-set
steps.smun5l8b: Call the elevator, kill the Bloathead that arrives with it and rest at the bonfire

steps.u37tsrnt: Make sure you have your light source equipped, go down the path, quickly kill the @crystal-lizard, kill all the Bloatheads and get the @dark-bead sorcery
steps.024i6bzk: Continue down, walk on to the illusory floor on the left, follow the apparition and use the elevator to open a shortcut back to @royal-woods
steps.62jb3m2j: Go back down, hit the illusory wall, save @great-grey-wolf-sif[Puppy Sif] from the Humanity Spirits and pick up the @cleansing-greatshield
steps.ndg227v8: Go back out and down to the left, kill all the Humanity Spirits and get the @black-flame pyromancy
steps.df4wvkf9: Head back up, kill the Bloathead Mage and get the @twin-humanities
steps.trmxlckq: Kill the big group of Humanity Spirits and drop down to get the @carvings[Help Me! carving]
steps.xkrcc6hh: Drop down again, walk back up, go down the stone pillar, get the @white-titanite-slab and put on the @silver-pendant

steps.bygpku02: You can summon @great-grey-wolf-sif[Sif], if you saved him, using the summon sign inside the boss area

steps.xkrmae8k: Rest at the bonfire, warp to @oolacile-sanctuary and talk to @elizabeth to get three @elizabeths-mushroom[Elizabeth's Mushrooms]

steps.7wu7d0y8: Farm some @humanity if needed and kindle all the @bonfire[Bonfires]
steps.0uqp7sju: If you missed any @ore[Titanites] or @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] go and get them
steps.v4p2p5h6: Visit the vendors and buy any items, miracles, sorceries and pyromancies that you will need
steps.984us1t6: Get any items you need from @snuggly
steps.vtwqysmk: Buy any consumables you need from the various vendors, like arrows
steps.qu6ved1b: Buy any armor sets you need from @domhnall-of-zena
steps.pyhhddsr: Kill @the-ancient-spider-queen and @darkmoon-knightess to get their @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul] and talk to @anastacia-of-astora[Anastacia] to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.h3p9yzb3: Kill all the @merchants[Blacksmiths] to get their items
steps.lsg5j1ih: Kill all the other @merchants to get their drops

steps.g2f3ul2s: Drop down the hole and if you haven't already then offer the Lord Souls
steps.qay19xgq: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 65-80+ to get summoned

steps.kt26uhj9: After killing him you can use the bonfire to get the good ending and the To Link The Fire achievement
steps.zx5ftnef: Or you can leave the area to get the evil ending and the Dark Lord achievement

steps.arntxbsm: Congratz on completing one of the best RPGs ever made. Now go #undead-asylum[do it again]!
